moves.2. b3: This surprised me. Not the usual response.
moves.2... d6 3. Bb5+: I thought this was a waste of time.
moves.3... Nc6 4. Bd3: Moving the bishop twice. Not good.
moves.4... Nf6 5. Bc4: Definitely NOT the best idea, moving the bishop three times.
moves.5... Bg4: Stockfish marks this as a mistake. I don't see why.
moves.6. f3 Bh5 7. Bd3: Moving the bishop four times. Obviously not good.
moves.7... h6 8. Bb2 Bg6 9. Bc3 Bh7 10. a3 g6: A very strong kingside for me.
moves.12. b4 cxb4 13. axb4: A pair of pawns go off the board.
moves.13... e6 14. g4 Nd7: And this is a blunder by me. The bishop on g7 is hanging.
moves.16. f5: Marked as a mistake by Stockfish.
moves.16... exf5 17. gxf5 gxf5 18. exf5: Two more pairs of pawns go off the board.
moves.20. d3 Bxh3: Left her knight hanging, so I took that too.
moves.22. Rg3 Bf5 23. Qc1: Marked as a error by Stockfish.
moves.24. Qe3 b6 25. Rg1: Rook has moved back and forth.
